verses.verse: I am the <S%H1397>man<s%> that has <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H6040>affliction<s%> by the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of his <S%H5678>wrath.<s%>
He has <S%H5090>led<s%> me and <S%H3212>caused<s%> me to walk in <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and not in <S%H216>light.<s%>
Surely against me he <S%H7725>turns<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H2015>again<s%> and again all the <S%H3117>day.<s%>
My <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and my <S%H5785>skin<s%> has he made <S%H1086>old;<s%> he has <S%H7665>broken<s%> my <S%H6106>bones.<s%>
He has built <S%H1129>against<s%> <S%H5362>me,<s%> and surrounded me with <S%H7219>gall<s%> and <S%H8513>travail.<s%>
He has <S%H3427>made<s%> me to dwell in dark <S%H4285>places,<s%> as those that have been <S%H5769>long<s%> <S%H4191>dead.<s%>
He has <S%H1443>walled<s%> me <S%H3318>about,<s%> that I can't go forth; he has made my <S%H5178>chain<s%> <S%H3513>heavy.<s%>
<S%H2199>Yes,<s%> when I cry, and <S%H2199>call<s%> for <S%H5640>help,<s%> he shuts out my <S%H8605>prayer.<s%>
He has <S%H1443>walled<s%> up my <S%H1870>ways<s%> with cut <S%H1496>stone;<s%> he has made my <S%H5410>paths<s%> <S%H5753>crooked.<s%>
He is to me as a <S%H1677>bear<s%> lying in <S%H693>wait,<s%> as a <S%H738>lion<s%> in secret <S%H4565>places.<s%>
He has turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and pulled me in <S%H6582>pieces;<s%> he has <S%H7760>made<s%> me <S%H8074>desolate.<s%>
He has <S%H1869>bent<s%> his <S%H7198>bow,<s%> and <S%H5324>set<s%> me as a <S%H4307>mark<s%> for the <S%H2671>arrow.<s%>
He has caused the <S%H1121>shafts<s%> of his <S%H827>quiver<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> into my <S%H3629>kidneys.<s%>
I am become a <S%H7814>derision<s%> to all my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and their <S%H5058>song<s%> all the <S%H3117>day.<s%>
He has <S%H7646>filled<s%> me with <S%H4844>bitterness,<s%> he has <S%H7301>sated<s%> me with <S%H3939>wormwood.<s%>
He has also <S%H1638>broken<s%> my <S%H8127>teeth<s%> with gravel <S%H2687>stones;<s%> he has <S%H3728>covered<s%> me with <S%H665>ashes.<s%>
You have <S%H2186>removed<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> far <S%H2186>off<s%> from <S%H7965>peace;<s%> I <S%H5382>forgot<s%> <S%H2896>prosperity.<s%>
I <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H5331>strength<s%> is <S%H6>perished,<s%> and my <S%H8431>expectation<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> my <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and my <S%H4788>misery,<s%> the <S%H3939>wormwood<s%> and the <S%H7219>gall.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2142>still<s%> remembers <S%H7743>them,<s%> and is bowed down within me.
This I <S%H7725>recall<s%> to my <S%H3820>mind;<s%> therefore have I <S%H3176>hope.<s%>
It is because of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s loving <S%H2617>kindnesses<s%> that we are not <S%H8552>consumed,<s%> because his <S%H7356>compassion<s%> <S%H3615>doesn't<s%> fail.
They are <S%H2319>new<s%> every <S%H1242>morning;<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> is your <S%H530>faithfulness.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is my <S%H2506>portion,<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> my <S%H5315>soul;<s%> therefore will I hope in <S%H3176>him.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> to those who <S%H6960>wait<s%> for <S%H5315>him,<s%> to the soul that seeks <S%H1875>him.<s%>
It is <S%H2896>good<s%> that a man should <S%H3175>hope<s%> and quietly <S%H1748>wait<s%> for the <S%H8668>salvation<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
It is <S%H2896>good<s%> for a <S%H1397>man<s%> that he <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> in his <S%H5271>youth.<s%>
Let him <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H910>alone<s%> and keep <S%H1826>silence,<s%> because he has laid it on <S%H5190>him.<s%>
Let him put his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> if so <S%H3426>be<s%> there may <S%H3426>be<s%> <S%H8615>hope.<s%>
Let him <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H3895>cheek<s%> to him who <S%H5221>strikes<s%> <S%H7646>him;<s%> let him be filled full with <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>
For the <S%H136>Lord<s%> will not cast <S%H2186>off<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
For though he cause <S%H3013>grief,<s%> yet he will have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his loving <S%H2617>kindnesses.<s%>
For he does not <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H3820>willingly,<s%> nor <S%H3013>grieve<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H376>men.<s%>
To <S%H1792>crush<s%> under <S%H7272>foot<s%> all the <S%H615>prisoners<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%>
To turn <S%H5186>aside<s%> the <S%H4941>right<s%> of a <S%H1397>man<s%> before the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the Most <S%H5945>High,<s%>
To <S%H5791>subvert<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> in his <S%H7379>cause,<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>doesn't<s%> approve.
Who is he who <S%H559>says,<s%> and it comes to <S%H136>pass,<s%> when the Lord <S%H6680>doesn't<s%> command it?
<S%H7451>Doesn't<s%> evil and <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3318>come<s%> out of the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the Most <S%H5945>High?<s%>
Why does a <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H596>complain,<s%> a <S%H1397>man<s%> for the punishment of his <S%H2399>sins?<s%>
Let us <S%H2664>search<s%> and <S%H2713>try<s%> our <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and turn <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Let us lift <S%H5375>up<s%> our <S%H3824>heart<s%> with our <S%H3709>hands<s%> to <S%H410>God<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>
<S%H5168>We<s%> have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> and have <S%H4784>rebelled;<s%> you have not <S%H5545>pardoned.<s%>
You have <S%H5526>covered<s%> with <S%H639>anger<s%> and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H2026>us;<s%> you have killed, you have not <S%H2550>pitied.<s%>
You have <S%H5526>covered<s%> yourself with a <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> so that no <S%H8605>prayer<s%> can pass <S%H5674>through.<s%>
You have <S%H7760>made<s%> us an <S%H5501>off-scouring<s%> and <S%H3973>refuse<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>
All our <S%H341>enemies<s%> have <S%H6475>opened<s%> their mouth wide against <S%H6310>us.<s%>
<S%H6343>Fear<s%> and the <S%H6354>pit<s%> have come on <S%H7612>us,<s%> devastation and <S%H7667>destruction.<s%>
My <S%H5869>eye<s%> runs <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H6388>streams<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> for the <S%H7667>destruction<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people.<s%>
My <S%H5869>eye<s%> pours <S%H5064>down,<s%> and <S%H1820>doesn't<s%> cease, without any <S%H2014>intermission,<s%>
Until <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> look <S%H8259>down,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
My <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H5953>affects<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> because of all the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of my <S%H5892>city.<s%>
They have <S%H6679>chased<s%> me <S%H6679>relentlessly<s%> like a <S%H6833>bird,<s%> those who are my <S%H341>enemies<s%> without <S%H2600>cause.<s%>
They have cut <S%H6789>off<s%> my <S%H2416>life<s%> in the <S%H953>dungeon,<s%> and have <S%H3034>cast<s%> a stone on <S%H68>me.<s%>
<S%H4325>Waters<s%> flowed <S%H6687>over<s%> my <S%H7218>head;<s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> I am cut <S%H1504>off.<s%>
I <S%H7121>called<s%> on your <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> out of the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H953>dungeon.<s%>
You <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H6963>voice;<s%> <S%H5956>don't<s%> hide your <S%H241>ear<s%> at my <S%H7309>breathing,<s%> at my <S%H7775>cry.<s%>
You drew <S%H7126>near<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H7121>called<s%> on <S%H559>you;<s%> you said, <S%H3372>Don't<s%> be afraid.
<S%H136>Lord,<s%> you have <S%H7378>pleaded<s%> the <S%H7379>causes<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul;<s%> you have <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> my <S%H2416>life.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you have <S%H7200>seen<s%> my <S%H5792>wrong.<s%> <S%H8199>Judge<s%> my <S%H4941>cause.<s%>
You have <S%H7200>seen<s%> all their <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> and all their devices against <S%H4284>me.<s%>
You have <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H2781>reproach,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and all their devices against <S%H4284>me,<s%>
The <S%H8193>lips<s%> of those that rose <S%H6965>up<s%> against <S%H1902>me,<s%> and their device against me all the <S%H3117>day.<s%>
You <S%H5027>see<s%> their sitting <S%H3427>down,<s%> and their rising <S%H7012>up;<s%> I am their <S%H4485>song.<s%>
You will <S%H7725>render<s%> to them a <S%H1576>recompense,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> according to the <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
You will <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H4044>hardness<s%> of <S%H3820>heart,<s%> your curse to <S%H8381>them.<s%>
You will <S%H7291>pursue<s%> them in <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H8045>destroy<s%> them from under the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
